name: Magic Wand (Trijam 166)
description:
Welcome to Magic Wand!

You're a wizard trapped in an old castle and you have to fight multiple waves of monsters. Use your magic wand to create a beam to obliterate them! After each wave you will have a choice :

  • Upgrade your magic wand which will increase its damage. Due to time contraints you can only see 4 upgrades (beam color from yellow to red) but even after the red beam (wand level 4), your damage will still increase.
  • Heal yourself (to full health, lucky you).

How to play:

  • Move your wizard using the arrows or WASD or ZQSD (my advise is to not use arrow keys otherwise the page will scroll).
  • When you left click on your mouse, a beam will be created from your cursor to your magic wand. You can then hold your click and move your mouse to deal damage to enemies.
  • Each wave contains an unlimited number of enemies but you only need to kill a certain number to go to the next wave. The remaining enemies to kill in a wave is indicated at the top of the screen.
  • Each wave increases enemy speed and health.

Controls:

Move wizardArrow keys / WASD / ZQSDCreate magic beamHold mouse left click

This game has been made in 3 hours for Trijam 166 (theme: upgrade your weapons) by Nicolas.
